mean_en: a very small piece of matter (= a substance) that carries no electric charge and that forms part of the nucleus (= central part) of an atom
sentence: Physicists spend a lot of time trying to detect neutrons in atoms.
sentence_trans: 物理学家们花了很多时间，在原子内探测中子。
word_etyma: neutr中间的 + on表名词，……子 → 中子
